value.Name: Magento
value.Value: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-16"?><FsPickler version="2.0.0.0" type="Microsoft.FSharp.Collections.FSharpList`1[System.String]"><value flags="sequence"><elem>Remote Code Execution vulnerability in CMS and layouts</elem><elem>Arbitrary File Disclose</elem><elem>Arbitrary File Delete</elem><elem>Arbitrary file delete + Lack of input sanitization leading to Remote Code Execution</elem><elem>Security Issue with referrer</elem><elem>Setup pages expose sensitive data</elem><elem>Order history disclosure</elem></value></FsPickler>
